basic_info.summary: Highly driven, adaptable full stack developer passionate in refining my technical and developer skills with the new trends that surrounds the modern world of technology. Strong focus on React.js, CSS, WordPress, Python, NodeJS, and PHP, with particular interest in Front/Back-end Development. Also have a strong background in biology which will serve me for a goal in the future. When I'm not coding, you can probably find me weightlifting, learning new languages, or doing activities to better myself.

education.details: During my undergrad I was on the pre-med planning on becoming a physician in the future. I had a minor in chemistry/psychology and work as a laboratory technician.

16-week (300+ hours) project-based software development program teaching HTML5, CSS3, SASS, React.js, FLUX, Webpack, Python, Django, RESTful API's, SQL, MongoDB, HTTP Architecture, AJAX, MVC, ORM, Migrations, Git

experiences.details:
•	Build responsive web application for a company or person
•	Manipulating back-end data using back-end services such as WordPress, Django, SQL, etc.
•	Engaging sites through React JavaScript along many other tools

•	Demonstrated substantial knowledge in the services and products' benefits offered by Apple as well as some third party products to provide the customer with a complete solution in order to enrich their lives
•	Aiding on any apple related technical difficulties.

•	Provided technical assistance to any department on the hotel. Installed computer operating systems hardware and software
•	Maintain computers perform

projects.intro: Currently working in open source projects at the moment.

assignments.title: The Poker Society
assignments.tagline: Built WordPress, React Js Context Provider for the front end. The Poker Society is a service app that allow poker players ranging from beginner level to professional level to visualized calendar with tournaments available in different casino in Miami FL.

assignments.title: Crippy
assignments.tagline: With React.js front end, an app where you can compare numerous cryptocurrency of your choice. As well you are able to add maximum ten coins to your favorite list.

assignments.title: Client Panel
assignments.tagline: This is an applciation where you can add/delete/update a new client personal information and decided whether you want to add money to the balance they need to pay. Redux and Firebase were used in this application.
